All questions and answers on the Community Portal are authored for and by the community and focus on Xperience by Kentico. Although Kentico monitors them, we cannot guarantee a timely response. If you need a help with one of Kentico's products, please feel free to contact support. Have a question about Kentico Xperience 13 or an earlier version of Kentico? Try asking on the DevNet Q&A forums.
